a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Human Capital Index in males vs. females, 2020
The Human Capital Index (HCI) combines indicators of health and education into a measure of the human capital that
a child born today can expect to obtain by their 18th birthday, on a scale from 0 to 1. Higher values indicate higher
